products.title: Splash Solar Yellow Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Solar Yellow Electric Roller Blind in Yellow. Made to measure from £122.00 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our moisture-resistant Splash solar yellow electric roller blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space.  The bold yellow roller is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its warm saturated shade. 
 
Electric blinds are also perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any space, and are cordless and therefore child-safe by design.   At Swift Direct Blinds, when purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of our free 5 year guarantee, which means investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.  
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX2056 Fabric Colour: Solar Yellow Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Mellow Yellow Electric Roller Blind

products.productdescription:
Contemporary and stylish, our moisture-resistant Splash Mellow Yellow electric roller blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space.  This pastel yellow electric roller is a beautiful, warm-toned colour which will work well with most colour palettes within the home or office.  
 
Electric blinds are also perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any space.   At Swift Direct Blinds, when purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of our free 5 year guarantee, which mean you know you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.  
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX2096 Fabric Colour: Mellow Yellow Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable White Headrail with Top or Face Fix Brackets.     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes
